author: cnbc.com
title: Sonic Foundry to Release First Quarter 2018 Results on February 13, 2018
text:
MADISON, Wis., Feb. 07, 2018 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Sonic Foundry, Inc. (NASDAQ: SOFO), the trusted global leader for video creation and management solutions, today announces it will release its first fiscal quarter 2018 results on Tuesday, February 13 after the close of the market.
The company will hold its corporate webcast for analysts and investors at 4:30 p.m. ET. Attendees will view the presentation via the company's webcasting platform, Mediasite.
To access the webcast, please register at www.sonicfoundry.com/earnings on or before Feb. 13, 2018. Viewers can participate in a Q&A session immediately following the prepared remarks through the Mediasite player.
A video archive of the full earnings call, including Q&A, will be available for 90 days.
About Sonic Foundry®, Inc.
Sonic Foundry (NASDAQ:SOFO) is the global leader for video capture, management and streaming solutions. Trusted by more than 4,700 educational institutions, corporations, health organizations and government entities in over 65 countries, its Mediasite Video Platform quickly and cost-effectively automates the capture, management, delivery and search of live and on-demand streaming videos. Leading research firms Aragon, Forrester, Wainhouse and Frost & Sullivan recognize Sonic Foundry as a leader in enterprise video, webcasting and lecture capture. Learn more at www.sonicfoundry.com and @mediasite.
